title: r/Pettyrevenge Porch Pirate Steals A Box of Poo!
description:
r/Pettyrevenge In today's video, OP's packages keep getting stolen by a porch pirate. She's pretty sure that the porch pirate is actually living in the same building, but it's impossible to prove because the cops are completely uninterested in helping her. So, OP decides to take matters into her own hands and constructs a stink bomb box filled with poo and rotten food. Steal this, porch pirate! If you like this video and want to see more, hit the subscribe button!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Sp5fO_steE
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
